documentation.title: Operator Spacing
documentation.standard: Always put one space on both sides of logical, comparison and concatenation operators. Always put one space after an assignment operator.

code.title: Valid: one space before and after an operator.
Valid: a new line instead of a space is okay too.
Invalid: too much space after operator on new line.
Valid: one space after assignment operator.
Invalid: too much/little space after assignment operator.
